user.title: Connect to Sigenergy Energy Storage System
user.description:
Set up a Sigenergy Energy Storage System to monitor and control it through Home Assistant. 

Make sure the Sigenergy system is connected to the same network as Home Assistant and the Modbus option has been enabled by the installer.

device_type.title: Select Device Type
device_type.description: Choose the type of Sigenergy device you want to add.

plant_config.title: Configure Sigenergy Plant
plant_config.description: Set up a new Sigenergy Plant to monitor and control it through Home Assistant. The Plant ID will be automatically set to 247.

data.host: Host (IP address of the main Sigenergy inverter)
data.ac_charger_slave_ids: AC Charger Device IDs (comma-separated when multiple. Default is empty for no AC charger)
data.dc_charger_slave_ids: Inverter IDs with DC Chargers attached (comma-separated when multiple)
data.read_only: Read-Only Mode (prevents any writes to the Sigenergy system)

select_plant.title: Select Plant
select_plant.description: Choose the Sigenergy Plant to which this device will be connected.

select_inverter.title: Select Inverter
select_inverter.description: Choose the Sigenergy Inverter to which this DC Charger will be connected.

inverter_config.title: Configure Sigenergy Inverter
inverter_config.description: Set up a Sigenergy Inverter. For the first inverter in a plant, the host and port will be pre-filled with the plant's values.

ac_charger_config.title: Configure Sigenergy AC Charger
ac_charger_config.description: Set up a Sigenergy AC Charger. Enter the unique host address and port for this AC Charger.

data.host: Host (IP address of this AC charger)

dc_charger_config.title: Configure Sigenergy DC Charger
dc_charger_config.description: Set up a Sigenergy DC Charger connected to the selected inverter.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Sigenergy System
reconfigure.description: Update the list of device IDs for this Sigenergy system.

data.ac_charger_slave_ids: AC Charger Device ID (Default is empty for no AC charger)
data.dc_charger_slave_ids: Inverter IDs with DC Chargers attached (comma-separated when multiple)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Sigenergy system. Please check the host and port.
error.each_id_must_be_between_1_and_246: Each ID must be between 1 and 246.
error.dc_charger_requires_inverter: DC charger IDs must correspond to configured inverter IDs.
error.ac_charger_conflicts_inverter: AC charger IDs must be different from inverter IDs.
error.no_plants_available: No plants are available. Please add a plant first.
error.no_inverters_available: No inverters are available on the selected plant. Please add an inverter first.
error.read_only_mode_error: Cannot write to the Sigenergy system while in read-only mode.

abort.already_configured: This Sigenergy system is already configured.

abort.parent_inverter_not_found: The parent inverter configuration could not be found.
